org.rcsb.mbt.model.geometry
Class Algebra

java.lang.Object
  org.rcsb.mbt.model.geometry.Algebra

public class Algebra
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides a number of methods for performing linear algebra calculations on cartesian coordinate arrays.

Author:
John L. Moreland
See Also:
Bond, BondFactory

angle

public static float angle(double[] _v1,
                          double[] _v2,
                          double[] _v3)
Calculate the angle formed by three virtex coordinates. 

  v1  v3
   \  /
    v2

Parameters:
v1 - An end virtex coordinate as float[3].
v2 - The middle virtex coordinate as float[3].
v3 - An end virtex coordinate as float[3].
Returns:
angle in degrees.

angle

                          float[] v2,
                          float[] v3)

dihedralAngle

public static float dihedralAngle(double[] _v1,
                                  double[] _v2,
                                  double[] _v3,
                                  double[] _v4)
Calculate the dihedral angle defined by four virtex coordinates. 

  v1     v4
   \     /
    v2--v3

Parameters:
v1 - An end virtex coordinate as float[3].
v2 - An interior virtex coordinate as float[3].
v3 - An interior virtex coordinate as float[3].
v4 - An end virtex coordinate as float[3].
Returns:
dihedral angle in degrees.

dihedralAngle

public static float dihedralAngle(float[] v1,
                                  float[] v2,
                                  float[] v3,
                                  float[] v4)
